NAME.Nominative: Hieromartyrs Nicander, Bishop of Myra, and Hermes the Presbyter (1st C)

SAINT.LIFE: Both were disciples of the Holy Apostle Titus from whom they received ordination. During the persecution torturers dragged them over the rocks, pierced them with nails, thrust them into fire and, finally, threw them into the pit and buried them alive.
